mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( title, content, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, title, content, reg_date, upd_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title =#{title}, content =#{content}, upd_date = now() WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, title, content, reg_date, upd_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no > 0 ORDER BY notice_no DESC, reg_date DESC
